title: pazhani appan
sahitya:
pazhani appan nin padam maravEn eppadavi vandAlum kandA guruparA


anupallavi

  mazhai nigar painkuzal vaLLi kunjari maNALa iv-vEhzai pangALa dayALa ten


caraNam    inba tunbam edilum nI tuNai irundemmaik-kAttaruLa vENDum
anbuDan ANDavanE unnai maravA-daDiyiNai paNiya varam taruvAi ten
